Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Regularly \Reg"u*lar*ly\, adv. In a regular manner; in uniform order; methodically; in due order or time. [1913 Webster]

regularly adv 1: in a regular manner; "letters arrived regularly from his children" [syn: {on a regular basis}] [ant: {irregularly}] 2: having a regular form; "regularly shaped objects" [ant: {irregularly}] 3: in a regular way without variation; "try to breathe evenly" [ant: {irregularly}]
